statusDetails.message:
class com.playwright.cucumber.step_definitions.SimpleStepDef does not have a public zero-argument constructor.

To use dependency injection add an other ObjectFactory implementation such as:
 * cucumber-picocontainer
 * cucumber-spring
 * cucumber-jakarta-cdi
 * ...etc
